description: CRITICAL: Domain concepts must be grouped by domain area and relationships, not by technical layers, object types, or architectural concerns.

do.description: Group by domain area and relationships
content: Group related concepts together by domain area
Keep domain concepts in same section regardless of technical layer

dont.description: Don't group by technical layers or object types
content: Don't group by technical layers (presentation, business, data)
Don't group by object types (DTOs, services, repositories)
- Grouping by technical concerns instead of domain relationships
- Separating domain concepts by architectural layers
